definitions.title: n. pr. m.
definitions.body: an officer of Nebuchad. acc. to MT Je 39:3 = (assumed) Šumgir Nabu (Schr:COT), but prob. text. err.; Gie (plausibly) takes [[סמגר]] as crpt. dittogr. of [[רב מג]], and joins [[נבו]] to foll., [[נבושׂרסכים]] = [[נְבוּשַׁזְבַּן]], cf. v:Je 39:13 and LXX Samagwq (Samagad, Samagar, etc.) kai\ Nabousaxar.
